the_question.question: Who is the main character in the Super Mario Bros. franchise?
Who is the main character in the Halo series?

the_question.answer: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
the_question.question: Which game is often considered one of the greatest of all time and was released for the Nintendo 64 in 1998?

Which game has sold the most copies of any single game in history, as of 2023?
